Title: PAUL DITISHEIM POCKET WATCH | PLATINUM DIAMOND (2CT) ENAMEL CASE CA1930S
Description: Marvelous Platinum Diamond (2CT) and Enamel Paul Ditisheim Pocket Watch Paul Ditisheim; Man’s; Serial #405,637; CA1930’s CASE: The 14-size oversized 45mm No. 26,027 platinum case features enamel decorations with a diamond bezel. DIAL: This silver color dial features Arabic numerals, and diamond hands. MOVT: The 18-jewel nickel movement has a lever escapement, bridge-style layout and signed. C 3 (The case is in very good condition) D 3 (The dial is in very good condition) M 3 (The movement is in very good condition) R 9 (Rarity on a scale of #1 being very common to #10 being extremely rare) Experts Opinion: Vintage 30’s platinum case, enamel rim, highest quality 2 Carats full-cut diamonds. Bezel approximately 60, hi-grade with 18-jewel movement, black Breguet factory porcelain numerals. A beautiful timepiece!
